message.body: No I have class from 11 to 10 pm tomorrow no breaks
Aw I'm just having a hard time transitioning and the live and wedding have really made it harder
Shd I come to Boston tonite or tomorrow ?
I know I know. I wanna help.
No there isnt anything to do but wait for it to pass I am just really emotional about the whole thing and a little distrustful about the size of my program.
Yes I know. Give it a little time all around.
I don't think it is going to be successful in the same way it has been on the past. I'm too inexperienced. The guy is too cocky. And the woman is too timid

you are not giving them or it a chance - wait a bit. either you will all warm up to each other or you will have to talk to the administration to make some kind of change. but i have seen you unhappy at the start of other things that have turned out well once you found your way. it's too early now, but if you can find a 'place' in the program that makes sense for you, you have some leeway to make it happen (b/c there are so few people).
Also having this long heavy period doesn't help
I had to email myself that MSG and copy and paste bc it was too long
